column2: You wake up as a vegan.
column7: Start telling people you are vegan right away.
column9: Start eating right away otherwise you won't get enough calories today.

column2: Your office coffee machine only has dairy milk.
column7: Ask office staff to order oat milk.
column11: You go to the coffee shop downstairs.

column2: BUT how do you get enough Protein?
column5: My body creates it; by answering dumb questions.
column9: I don't ; I just die out of protein deficiency

column2: The stuff asks: Can there be some Creme in it?
column5: You reply: Can I pay with Monopoly Money?
column7: You ask if the creme  was dairy free
column9: You hand them a package of oat Creme.

column2: You can see some egg stuff in your noodles
column7: You tell the stuff to bring you a new portion

column2: You are invited to a buisness dinner; but no one considered vegetarian/vegan options.
column5: You were prepared and brought your own food
column7: You end up eating the decoration

column2: After your safe return from the desert island, your biggest problem now is:
column5: To keep smiling at colleagues while they crack vegan jokes.
column7: Deciding between oat milk, soy milk, almond milk, zygnut milk, banana milk or potato milk.
column9: Not being able to make it through the day due to your B12 protein deficiency.
column11: You forgot your own lunch box.

column2: You are on a date. Your choice of food makes your date ask: Are you vegetarian/vegan?
column9: You throw one of your cauliflowers into their eye.

column2: They ask: so what can you eat then?
column7: You take a bite out of your date.

column2: They send you to a deserted island.
column5: You sit under palms; drinking coconutmilk; eating Papayas
column7: You build a raft with your super vegan strength.
column9: Your friend picks you up because we live in a technological world and you have a GPS tracker.

column2: After returning home alone from your date, your rescue cats greet you at the door.
column5: You sit on the couch with them and watch the latest depressing documentary about factory farming.
column7: You play with your cats and wonder if it's okay to feed them meat.
column9: You start soaking cashews because you might want to do something with them tomorrow.

column2: Your date decides to order a vegan dinner as well.
column5: Due to the libido-enhancing properties of vegan dinners, the rest of the night goes very well!
column7: Your date hates the food, blames you and walks out.

column2: You send your date to a desert island.
column5: You tell no one and go about your business.
column7: You plan to return later and see if they have learned their lesson.
